channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- EcoStruxure Process Expert
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- EcoStruxure Process Expert

item.title: CVE-2022-24323|2024-08-03T04:07:02.566Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20process%20expert
item.description: A CWE-754: Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability exists that could cause a disruption of communication between the Modicon controller and the engineering software, when an attacker is able to intercept and manipulate specific Modbus response data. Affected Product: EcoStruxure Process Expert (V2021 and prior), EcoStruxure Control Expert (V15.0 SP1 and prior)
